(From the Ulteo release announcement:)
The Ulteo Application System is a FREE installable version of Ulteo,
that ships with hundreds applications and innovative features that
include:

- Global Ulteo authentication

- Automatic data backup/synchronization to/from the Ulteo Online
Desktop

- "My Digital Life" panel to organize your digital life easier and
better

- Automatic system and application incremental upgrade

- Very fast to install, very easy to use

Ulteo A.S. Stable comes with a lot of applications by default,
including Firefox 2.0 and OpenOffice.org 2.3
